title: Instructional Design Strategies for Effective Science Teaching in MOOCs

context.additional_context: Conducted as a 5-day intensive workshop format, emphasizing real-time interaction and project-based learning

learning_goals: Learners can explain the six-stage instructional design strategy for MOOCs: preparation, attraction, engagement, interaction, integration, and post-support.
Learners can propose three or more technology utilization strategies suitable for science-focused MOOCs.
Learners can design and implement project-based assessments in small-scale online environments.
Learners can apply methods for verifying MOOC effectiveness based on meta-analysis results.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
